19367.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>Renosu, Yugiri, my friends, hang on just
a little longer. We're on our way to help!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19367.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「レーノス　ユウギリ嬢ちゃん……
　すぐに　助けてやるからな。
　あと　ちょっとだけ　待っててくれ！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19367.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 레노스, 유우기리 아가씨……
　금방 구해줄게.
　조금만 기다려!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19367.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>雷诺斯、夕雾小姑娘……
马上就来救你们了。
再坚持一会儿！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19367.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>雷諾斯、夕霧小姑娘……
我們立刻就去救你們。
再撐一下啊！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19368.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>Hey there, Poranpan! We're back and we're
ready to learn some special moves from you!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19368.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「よお　支部長のおっさん！
　必殺技を覚えて　帰ってきたぜ！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19368.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 이봐, 지부장 영감님!
　필살기를 익히고 왔어!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19368.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>哟，支部长大叔！
我的搭档学会必杀技回来啦！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19368.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>喲，分部長大叔！
我的搭檔學會必殺技回來啦！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19369.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>Mmm yes. That's wonderful, <pc>!
Now, allow me to explain how to stop the spiritual
disturbance taking place in the Molinara Forest..<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19369.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「……うむ。見事じゃ　<pc>！
　今こそ　森の怒りを鎮める方法を
　お前さんに　伝えようぞ。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19369.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: ……좋아. 잘했네, <pc>!
　지금 바로 숲의 분노를 잠재울 방법을
　알려 주겠네.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19369.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>……嗯，干得好，<pc>！
我现在就将平息森林之怒的
方法告诉你。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19369.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>……嗯，做得好，<pc>！
我現在就將平息森林之怒的
方法告訴你。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19370.en:
The wrath of the forest phenomenon is caused by negative feelings of the tree spirits that reside in the Molinara Forest.
These feelings are hostile emotions, such as anger and hatred, and are typically directed toward humans.
19370.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「森の怒りとは　モリナラ大森林の樹々に宿る
　精霊たちの　ヒトへの怒りや　憎悪といった
　負の感情が　引きおこすもの。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19370.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 숲의 분노는 모리나라 대삼림의 나무에 깃든
　정령들에게 사람을 향한 분노와 증오 같은
　부정적인 감정이 쌓여서 일어나는 거라네.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19370.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>所谓森林之怒，是由寄宿在万橡大森林
树木中的精灵们对人抱有的
愤怒及憎恶等负面情感所引发的。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19370.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>所謂的森林之怒，是由寄宿在莫利納拉大森林
樹木中的精靈們對人抱有的
憤怒及憎惡等負面情感所引發的。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19371.en:
Now, those negative emotions have gathered and manifested into an incarnation of malice inside the Green Sanctuary, within the
Molinara Forest.
19371.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「そして　今　その負の感情は集合し
　モリナラ大森林の奥深く　緑の聖域にて
　憎悪の化身とでもいうべき姿となっておる。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19371.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 그리고 지금 그 부정적인 감정이 하나로 모여
　모리나라 대삼림 깊은 곳, 초록의 성역에서
　증오의 화신과도 같은 형상을 갖추었지.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19371.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>现在，这些负面的感情聚集到一起，
在万橡大森林深处的绿色圣域
化身为了憎恶的实体。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19371.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>而現在這些負面的感情聚集在一起，
在莫利納拉大森林深處的綠色聖域
化身為憎惡的實體。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19372.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>This manifestation is known as the Tree of Hatred,
and in order to appease spirits and put an end to the wrath of the forest, it must be defeated.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19372.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「その名も　憎悪の精霊樹。
　森の怒りを鎮めるには　こいつを
　倒さなくてはならないのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19372.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 이름하여 증오의 정령수.
　숲의 분노를 잠재우려면
　그 녀석을 쓰러뜨려야만 해.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19372.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>它的名字便是憎恶的精灵树。
想要平息森林之怒，
就要打倒它才行。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19372.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>其名為憎惡的精靈樹。
想要平息森林之怒，
就要打倒牠才行。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19373.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>However, defeating the Tree of Hatred will
not be an easy task, even for you.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19373.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「ただし　モリナラ大森林の中で
　憎悪の精霊樹と　戦ったとしても
　倒しきるのは　むずかしいじゃろう。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19373.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 단, 증오의 정령수와 싸운다 해도
　모리나라 대삼림 안에서
　놈을 쓰러뜨리긴 힘들 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19373.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>但是，在万橡大森林里
和憎恶的精灵树展开战斗，
是很难获胜的。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19373.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>只是，就算是在莫利納拉大森林中
和憎惡的精靈樹展開戰鬥，
要完全打倒牠還是難如登天。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19374.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>After all, you will be in their territory, they will
have the home field advantage and could do
any number of things to try to stop you.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19374.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「なにしろ　向こうのテリトリー内じゃ。
　不利となれば　相手は　お前さんを
　どうとでもできるじゃろうからな。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19374.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 숲은 정령수의 영역이니까.
　불리해지면 놈은 자네에게
　어떤 식으로든 해코지를 할 수 있지.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19374.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>毕竟这是对方的地盘嘛。
一旦你陷入劣势，
对方便可以对你为所欲为吧。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19374.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>畢竟是在對方的地盤上。
一旦你陷入劣勢，
對方便可以對你為所欲為。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19375.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>To minimize the risk, you can use Brownie
Boost to rally the spiritual forces to your your side.
That way, you won't be at such a big disadvantage.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19375.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「それを防ぐには　妖精たちのポルカを使って
　周りの精霊力を　味方につければよい。
　さすれば　ヤツの自由には　なるまいよ。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19375.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 그걸 막으려면 요정들의 폴카를 사용해
　주변의 정령력을 자네 편으로 만들어야 하네.
　그리하면 놈도 마음대로 못 할 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19375.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>为了防止这点，要使用妖精们的波尔卡，
将周围的精灵力施加给友方。
这样的话，那家伙就不能任性而为了。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19375.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>為了防止這點，要使用妖精的波卡舞，
將周圍的精靈力施加給友方。
這麼一來，那傢伙就不能任性而為了。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19376.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>That's what it will take to appease the
spirits and end put an end to this situation.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19376.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「これが　森の怒りを鎮めるために
　お前さんが　やるべきことの　すべてじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19376.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 이것이 숲의 분노를 잠재우기 위해
　자네가 해야 할 일일세.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19376.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>这就是为了平息森林之怒，
你所要做的全部事情了。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19376.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>這就是為了平息森林之怒，
你所要做的全部事情了。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19377.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>Amazing! You were able to say that entire spiel
with a straight face! I swear I could feel the
seriousness coming off of you like heat!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19377.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「すげえ！　……ダジャレなしでも 
　長いセリフ　言うことできたんだな。
　おっさんのマジな気持ち　ビンビン伝わったぜ！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19377.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 굉장하다! ……말장난 없이도
　이렇게 길게 말할 수 있구나.
　영감님이 얼마나 진지한지 잘 알겠어!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19377.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>好厉害！原来你能不呵呵呵的
说出这么长一段话啊。
我深刻体会到大叔认真的态度了！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19377.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>好厲害！……原來你能不呵呵呵地
說出這麼長一段話啊。
我深刻體會到大叔認真的態度了！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19378.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>Okay okay that's enough, Spiel.
Even I know when it's time to get down to
the nitty gritty and be serious.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19378.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「あまり言ってくださるな　スピルどの。
　いくら　わしでも　こんな時くらいは
　ダジャレを　忘れますわい。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19378.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 너무 그러지 마십시오, 스필 님.
　저도 말장난은 상황 봐 가면서 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19378.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>瞧您说的，斯比尔大人。
就算是我，
在这种时候也呵呵不出来啊。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19378.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>瞧您說的，斯比爾大人。
就算是我，
在這種時候也呵呵不出來啊。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19379.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>*Cough... cough*
Go on then, chosen Ranger! Use your power to bring
low the Tree of Hatred and restore peace to Molinara! <stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19379.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「……ゴホン！　さあ　選ばれし　レンジャーよ。
　お前さんのチカラで　憎悪の精霊樹を倒し
　モリナラの平和を　取りもどしてくれ！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19379.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: ……크흠! 자, 선택받은 레인저여.
　자네의 힘으로 증오의 정령수를 물리치고
　모리나라의 평화를 되찾아 주게!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19379.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>……咳咳！被选中的游侠啊。
请用你的力量打倒憎恶的精灵树，
夺回万橡的和平吧！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19379.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>……咳咳！被選上的遊俠啊。
請用你的力量打倒憎惡的精靈樹，
恢復莫利納拉的和平吧！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19380.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>Mmm hmm! Well then, I'll leave the rest to you.
Don't forget to use Brownie Boost when
you fight against the Tree of Hatred.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19380.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「うむ！　では　後のことは　まかせたぞ。
　精霊樹との戦いでは　妖精たちのポルカを
　使うことを　忘れんようにな。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19380.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 좋아! 그럼 뒷일을 부탁하겠네.
　정령수와 싸울 때 요정들의 폴카를
　사용하는 걸 잊지 말게나.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19380.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>好！接下来就交给你了。
不要忘记在与精灵树战斗时，
使用妖精们的波尔卡。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19380.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>嗯！接下來就交給你了。
在和精靈樹戰鬥時，
別忘了使用妖精的波卡舞。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

19381.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>I was going to ask you for a favor but it
seems like you're already busy doing favors
for a lot of other people.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19381.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「では　頼んだぞ……と思ったら
　なんじゃ　その　頼まれごとの数は！？<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19381.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 그럼 부탁하겠네……라고 하려 했더니만
　뭔가, 그 의뢰 수는!?<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19381.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>那就拜托……本想这么说，
但你怎么接了那么多任务？！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19381.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>那就拜託你了……本想這麼說，
但你怎麼接了那麼多的委託啊！？<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19382.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>Well it's not like I can ask anyone else to
complete this task! Go finish your other
stuff and hurry back here!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19382.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「そんなでは　この使命　まかせられんぞ！
　ええい。さっさと　手を空けてくるのじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19382.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 그래서는 이 사명을 맡길 수 없네!
　에잇, 어서 다른 일을 처리하고 오게!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19382.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>那我就不能将这使命交给你了！
快去解决那些任务吧！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19382.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>那我就不能將這使命交給你了！
你先去把那些事給解決掉吧！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19383.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>Well what are you waiting for then? Yugiri
and Renosu desperately need your help!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19383.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「この期におよんで　何をためらう？
　ユウギリも　レーノスも　お前さんの助けを
　待っておるはずじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19383.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 이 판국에 뭘 망설이는 겐가?
　유우기리와 레노스도 자네가
　구하러 오길 기다리고 있을 걸세!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19383.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>事到如今还有什么好犹豫的？
夕雾和雷诺斯都等着
你去救呢！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19383.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>事到如今還有什麼好猶豫的？
夕霧和雷諾斯
都等著你去救呢！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19384.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>I beg you to please reconsider! Without your
help we can't defeat the Tree of Hatred and
save all of those transformed by the spirits!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19384.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「わしからも　頼む！
　どうか　モリナラ大森林の怒りを鎮めて
　じんめんじゅになった　皆を救ってくれい！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19384.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 나도 부탁하겠네!
　제발 모리나라 대삼림의 분노를 잠재워
　인면수로 변한 사람들을 구해 주게!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19384.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>我也拜托你了！
请你平息万橡大森林的愤怒，
拯救变成了人面树的各位吧！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19384.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>我也拜託你了！
請你平息莫利納拉大森林的憤怒，
拯救變成了人面樹的大家吧！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19385.en:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>Why, human? How can you be unharmed
after being touched by our rage?<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19385.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>「……なぜだ？　ヒトよ。
　なぜ　我らの怒りにふれて　無事でいられる？<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19385.ko:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>: ……왜지? 사람이여.
　왜 우리의 분노를 사고도 무사한 것이냐?<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19385.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>人啊……为什么？
为什么在我的愤怒下还能安然无恙？<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19385.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>人類啊……為什麼？
為什麼在我的憤怒下還能安然無恙？<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19386.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>So this is the Tree of Hatred, huh? He's sort 
of a sullen looking fellow and not much to look at.
As a fellow spirit, I'm somewhat disappointed!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19386.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「こいつが　憎悪の精霊樹か。
　かーっ！　見るからに　陰気そうなヤツだな。
　同じ精霊として　恥ずかしいぜ！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19386.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 이 녀석이 증오의 정령수로군.
　윽! 척 보기에도 음침하게 생겼는걸.
　같은 정령으로서 내가 다 부끄럽네!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19386.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>这家伙就是憎恶的精灵树啊。
哎呀！看着就是个阴郁的家伙啊。
同样身为精灵，我感到好丢人啊！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19386.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>這傢伙就是憎惡的精靈樹啊。
哎呀！看著就是個陰鬱的傢伙啊。
同樣身為精靈，還真是慚愧啊！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19387.en:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>Ah I see. You were spared from our wrath
because you carry a forest spirit within you.<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19387.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>「……そうか。精霊を身に宿すがゆえに
　我らの怒りから　逃れえたか。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19387.ko:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>: ……그렇군, 정령이 깃든 탓에
　내 분노를 피할 수 있었나.<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19387.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>……原来如此。因精灵寄宿在体内，
便避开了我的愤怒啊。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19387.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>……原來如此。因為有精靈寄宿在體內，
才能避開了我的憤怒。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19388.en:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>O little spirit! These human creatures are
greedy, foolish, empty little things.
Why do you side with them?<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19388.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>「ちいさき精霊よ。
　ヒトは　欲深く　愚かで　あさましき存在。
　なにゆえ　そんな者たちの味方をする？<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19388.ko:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>: 작은 정령이여.
　사람은 탐욕스럽고 어리석으며 저열한 존재다.
　왜 사람의 편에 서는 것이냐?<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19388.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>小小的精灵啊。
人贪婪、愚蠢又肤浅。
你为什么要和人在一起呢？<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19388.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>小小的精靈啊。
人類貪婪、愚蠢又膚淺。
你為什麼要站在人類那一邊？<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19389.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>Oh be quiet! I mean, sure, they may be greedy,
stupid and impudent, there's more to them
than just that!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19389.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「うるっせーな！　たしかに　こいつら
　欲深で　愚かで　あさましいかもしんねーけど
　それだけじゃないのを　オレは知ってんだ！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19389.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 시끄러워! 네 말대로 이 녀석들이
　탐욕스럽고 어리석고 저열할지 몰라도
　난 그게 다가 아니란 걸 알아!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19389.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>吵死啦！这群家伙可能的确是
贪婪、愚蠢又肤浅，
但是我知道，他们并不只有这些！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19389.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>少囉嗦！這些傢伙或許
真的是貪婪、愚蠢又膚淺，
但我知道，他們並不只是這樣！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19390.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>I know that the humans of the Rangers Association
are fighting to protect the very same forest
you are!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19390.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「モリナラ支部の連中が
　この大森林の自然を守ろうと
　戦ってることを　オレは　知ってる！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19390.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 모리나라 지부 녀석들이
　이 대삼림의 자연을 지키기 위해
　싸우고 있단 걸 난 잘 알아!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19390.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>我知道万橡支部的
家伙们为了保护这片森林的
大自然而在战斗！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19390.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>我知道莫利納拉分部的人
為了保護這片森林的大自然
挺身而戰！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19391.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>I know that the people of the Logging Alliance
only did what they had to in desperation!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19391.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「伐採同盟の連中だって
　自分たちの暮らしや　大切な者のため
　必死だったことを　オレは　知ってる！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19391.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 벌채 동맹 녀석들도
　본인들의 삶과 소중한 사람을 위해
　죽어라 노력했단 걸 알아!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19391.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>我也知道采伐同盟的家伙们
为了自己的生活和重要的人
而在拼命！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19391.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>我也知道採伐同盟的人
為了自己的生活和重要的人
而拚命維生！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19392.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>And above all, I know my partner <cs_pchero>.
I know how hard they worked to get here
and how much they care!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19392.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「そして　なにより　オレの相棒……
　<cs_pchero>が　どんだけ　がんばって
　今　ここにいるかを　オレは　知ってる！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19392.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 그리고 무엇보다 내 파트너……
　{cs_pchero}|hpp(이,가) 얼마나 열심히 노력해서
　지금 여기 서 있는지도 안다고!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19392.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>而且，最重要的是……我知道
我的搭档<cs_pchero>多么努力，
现在才能够站到这里！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19392.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>而且，最重要的是……
我知道我的搭檔<cs_pchero>有多努力，
現在才能站在這裡！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19393.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>What do you know about anything anyways?
You're just a tree, you couldn't understand
anything about humans anyway.<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19393.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「そっちこそ　何を知ってんだよ？
　オメーは　ヒトの素晴らしいトコ
　これっぽっちも　わかってねーじゃねえか！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19393.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 그러는 너야말로 뭘 아는데?
　넌 사람의 좋은 점이라곤
　요만큼도 모르잖아!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19393.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>而你又知道什么？
你对人的出色之处一无所知！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19393.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>而你又知道什麼？
你對人類的出色之處

19394.en:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>Oh is that right? I think that container that
holds you has warped your mind. No matter,
I'll break it open and set you free again.<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19394.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>「ヒトに宿りし精霊は　その心も毒されるか。
　ならば　お前の　その入れ物を壊して
　正気に戻してやろう。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19394.ko:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>: 사람에게 깃든 정령은 마음마저 부정해지는가.
　그렇다면 네가 깃든 그릇을 파괴해
　제정신으로 돌려놔 주마.<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19394.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>寄宿于人的精灵连内心都被毒害了吗。
那我就破坏掉你的容器，
使你恢复正常。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19394.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>寄宿於人類的精靈連內心都被毒害了嗎？
那我就破壞你的容器，
使你恢復正常。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19395.en:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>Have you come again, little spirit with your
pet human? Allow me to free you from the
fleshy prison that has warped your mind.<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19395.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>「また来たのか　ヒトに宿る精霊よ。
　今度こそ　お前の　その入れ物を壊して
　正気に戻してやろう。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19395.ko:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>: 또 왔군, 사람에게 깃든 정령이여.
　이번에야말로 네가 깃든 그릇을 파괴해

19395.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>你又来了啊，寄宿于人的精灵啊。
这回我要破坏掉你的容器，
使你恢复正常。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19395.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>你又來了啊，寄宿於人類的精靈。
這回我一定要破壞你的容器，
使你恢復正常。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19396.en:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>Wicked invaders! This is not your domain.
You shall leave now!<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19396.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>「……おのれ　あさましき侵略者め。
　ここは　貴様たちの領域にあらず。
　立ち去るがよい！<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19396.ko:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>: ……네 이놈, 저열한 침략자여.
　여긴 네놈들의 영역이 아니다.
　썩 꺼져라!<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19396.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>……可恶，肤浅的侵略者。
这里不是你们的领域。
快离开！<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19396.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>……可惡，膚淺的侵略者。
這裡不是你們的領域。
快離開！<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19397.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>This isn't good, partner!
We have the whole of Molinara Forest against us!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19397.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「まずいぜ　相棒っ！
　モリナラ全体が　オレたちを拒んでやがる！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19397.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 위험해, 파트너!
　모리나라 전체가 우릴 거부하고 있어!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19397.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>不好，搭档！
整个万橡都在抗拒我们！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19397.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>糟了，搭檔！
整個莫利納拉都在抗拒我們！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19400.en:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>You wicked invaders! This is not your domain.
You shall leave now!<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19400.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>「……おのれ　あさましき侵略者め。
　ここは　貴様たちの領域にあらず。
　立ち去るがよい！<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19400.ko:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>: ……네 이놈, 저열한 침략자여.
　여긴 네놈들의 영역이 아니다.
　썩 꺼져라!<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19400.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>……可恶，肤浅的侵略者。
这里不是你们的领域。
快离开！<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19400.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>……可惡，膚淺的侵略者。
這裡不是你們的領域。
快離開！<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19401.en: <start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>Is this ineffective as well?<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19401.ja: <start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>「……これも　効かぬのか。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19401.ko: <start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>: ……이것도 통하지 않다니.<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19401.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>……这也无效吗？<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19401.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>……這個也無效嗎？<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19402.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>Looks like that Brownie Boost trick is
paying off after all, eh partner?<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19402.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「どうやら　妖精たちのポルカを使った成果が
　出たみたいだぜ　相棒？<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19402.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 보아하니 요정들의 폴카를 쓴
　효과가 나타나는 것 같은데, 파트너?<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19402.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>看来妖精们的波尔卡
发挥效果了，搭档。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19402.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>看來妖精的波卡舞
發揮效果了，搭檔。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19403.en:
That's right, the humans and their tricks. They come with fire, they come with axes... gnawing, biting, breaking, hacking, burning.
Destroyers and usurpers, curse them.
19403.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>「……そうであったな。ヒトは　いつの時代も
　こざかしい知恵と技を　武器として
　我らの森へと　侵略してくるのだ。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19403.ko:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>: ……그래 그랬지.
　사람은 언제나 잔꾀와 기술을 무기로
　우리의 숲을 침략했다.<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19403.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>……就是这样啊。无论什么时代，
人都将他们的小聪明与技术作为武器，
侵略我们的森林。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19403.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>……就是這樣啊。無論什麼時代，
人類都將他們的小聰明與技術作為武器，
侵略我們的森林。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19404.en:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>I will never forgive humans! Spirits of Molinara
Forest! Lend your strength to the incarnation
of your own malice! Lend your strength to me!<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19404.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>「だが　我は　決して　ヒトを許さぬ！
　モリナラの樹々に宿りし　精霊たちよ。
　己が憎悪の化身たる我に　チカラを貸せっ！<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19404.ko:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>: 하지만 난 절대로 사람을 용서치 않을 것이다!
　모리나라의 나무에 깃든 정령들이여.
　그대들의 증오의 화신인 내게 힘을 빌려다오!<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19404.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>但我决不饶恕人！
寄宿在万橡树木中的精灵们啊！
我是你们憎恶的化身，借给我力量吧！<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19404.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>但我絕不饒恕人類！
寄宿在莫利納拉樹木中的精靈們啊！
我是你們憎惡的化身，借給我力量吧！<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19405.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>This guy's not just going to give up.
We're going to have to find a way to quell his rage.<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19405.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「こいつは　キリがねーな。
　あのネガティブ野郎の　こり固まった憎しみを
　どうにかしなきゃ　解決しねえぞ　これ。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19405.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 이래선 끝이 안 나겠군.
　저 음침한 녀석의 뿌리 깊은 증오부터
　어떻게 하지 않는 한 해결하기 힘들겠어.<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19405.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>这下没完没了了。
不想办法对付那个消极家伙的顽固憎恶，
这事就解决不了呢。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19405.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>這下沒完沒了了。
不想辦法對付那個消極傢伙的頑固憎惡，
這事就解決不了呢。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19406.en: <start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>Okay, partner. I think I got an idea.<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19406.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「……なあ　相棒。
　ひとつ　いい方法が　あるんだ。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19406.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: ……이봐, 파트너.
　좋은 생각이 하나 있어.<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19406.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>……搭档啊。
我想到了一个好主意。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19406.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>……搭檔啊。
我想到了一個好主意。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19407.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>He and I are both spirits from the same realm.
I think... If I fuse with him my positive energy
should be able to neutralize his anger.<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19407.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「元は　どっちも　同じ精霊だ。
　オレが　あいつと　一体化してやれば
　あいつの憎悪を　中和してやれると思うんだ。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19407.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 따지고 보면 우리 둘 다 똑같은 정령이잖아.
　내가 저 녀석이랑 하나가 되면
　저 녀석의 증오가 중화될 거라고 생각해.<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19407.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>我和它本来都是精灵。
只要我们化为一体，
就能将那家伙的憎恶中和。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19407.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>我和他本來都是精靈。
只要我們化為一體，
就能將那傢伙的憎惡中和。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19408.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>I'm gonna do it!
I want to make him to understand the beauty
that humans are capable of.<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19408.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「いや。オレが　そうしてーんだ！
　あいつにも　ヒトの素晴らしさってモンを
　わかってほしいんだよ。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19408.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 아니, 내가 그렇게 하고 싶어!
　저 녀석에게도 사람의 좋은 점을
　가르쳐 주고 싶어.<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19408.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>不，这是我自愿的！
我想让它知道
人的出色之处！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19408.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>不，這是我自願的！
我想讓他知道
人類的出色之處。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19409.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>So, this is goodbye, partner.
It's been fun! Don't forget about me!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19409.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「だからよ……これで　お別れだ。
　あばよ！　相棒！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19409.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 그러니…… 이걸로 작별이다.
　잘 있어라! 파트너!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19409.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>所以啊……我们要就此告别了。
再见啦！搭档！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19409.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>所以啊……我們要就此告別了。
再見啦！搭檔！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19410.en:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>Nuooooo!
...What... is this? All the anger and all the hatred...
...It's gone...<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19410.ja:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>「ヌオォォォォ……な　なにをっ！？
　怒りが……憎悪が……消えてゆく……。<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19410.ko:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>: 으오오오오…… 무, 무슨 짓을!?
　분노가…… 증오가…… 사라진다…….<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19410.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>唔哦哦哦哦哦哦……你、你做了什么？！
愤怒……憎恶……消失了……<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19410.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m05503 _normal m00001>唔喔喔喔喔喔……你、你做了什麼！？
憤怒……憎惡……逐漸消失了……<stop_lip_animation m05503 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19411.en:
<center>O humans. Now that Spiel and I are one
I can see the error of my ways.
19411.ja:
<center>ヒトよ……。
わが一部となった　精霊スピルに免じ
今は　お前たちを許そう。
19411.ko:
<center>사람이여…….
나의 일부가 된 정령 스필을 보아
이번에는 너희를 용서하겠다.
19411.zh-Hans:
<center>人啊……
看在成为我身体一部分的
精灵斯比尔的面子上先原谅你们。
19411.zh-Hant:
<center>人類啊……
精靈斯比爾成了我身體的一部分，
看在他分上，
這次我就放過你們。

19412.en:
But as long as humans exist
history may well repeat itself.
19412.ja:
<center>だが　ヒトが存在する限り
必ず　また同じことが繰り返されるだろう。
だから……
19412.ko:
<center>하지만 사람이 존재하는 한
반드시 같은 일이 되풀이될 것이다.
그러니……
19412.zh-Hans:
<center>但是，只要人还存在，
就一定会重复同样的事情吧。
所以……
19412.zh-Hant:
<center>但是，只要人類還存在，
就一定會重蹈覆轍吧。
所以……

19413.en:
<center>...So please, do your best to make sure
it doesn't come to that, partner!
19413.ja:
<center>……だから　そうならないよーに
がんばってくれよ！　相棒！
19413.ko:
<center>……그러니까 그렇게 되지 않게
노력해 줘! 파트너!
19413.zh-Hans:
<center>……所以，为了不再发生这样的事情，
你要加油哦！搭档！
19413.zh-Hant:
<center>……所以，為了避免同樣的事情再度發生，
可要好好努力啊！搭檔！

19414.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>I can feel the rage of the forest spirits subsiding.
It looks like it's all over. You did well!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19414.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「森の怒りが鎮まる気配　感じておったよ。
　どうやら　すべて　終わったようじゃな。
　よく　やってくれた！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19414.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 숲의 분노가 누그러진 것을 느꼈네.
　보아하니 모두 잘 끝난 모양이로군.
　정말 잘했네!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19414.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>我感受到你平息了森林之怒。
看来一切都结束了呢。
干得漂亮！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19414.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>我感受到你平息了森林之怒。
看來一切都結束了呢。
做得好啊！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19415.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>You are the chosen Ranger, a pinnacle among
rangers. I know I don't deserve this honor
but please, let me present this to you if I may.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19415.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「お前さんこそ　レンジャーの中のレンジャー。
　その栄誉に　見合うものではないが
　どうか　これを　贈らせてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19415.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 자네야말로 레인저 중의 레인저.
　그 공적에 비하면 보잘것없네만
　부디 이걸 받아 주게.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19415.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>你才是游侠中的游侠。
虽然配不上你应获得的荣誉，
但是请收下这个吧。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19415.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>你才是遊俠中的遊俠。
雖然配不上你應獲得的榮譽，
但是請收下這個吧。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.en:
The quest "<%sev_quest_name>"
has transgressed with finesse!<update_quedate><open_irai>
42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

19416.ja: <start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>「ただいま　戻りましたーっ！<stop_lip_animation n01515 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19416.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>我回来了！<stop_lip_animation n01515 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19416.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>我回來了！<stop_lip_animation n01515 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19417.en:
<start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>Ugh. I'm so glad to be back. I never would
have been able to find someone to marry
me if I stayed looking like that...<stop_lip_animation n01515 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19417.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>「ううっ。ホントに　戻ってこれてよかった。
　あのまま　一生　じんめんじゅだったら
　お嫁に　行けなくなっちゃうとこでしたよぅ。<stop_lip_animation n01515 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19417.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>: 으흑, 원래대로 돌아와서 정말 다행이야.
　그대로 평생 인면수로 지냈다간
　시집도 못 갔을 거예요.<stop_lip_animation n01515 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19417.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>呜呜。能回来真是太好了。
要是像那样当一辈子人面树，
我就嫁不出去了。<stop_lip_animation n01515 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19417.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>嗚嗚，能回來真是太好了。
要是像那樣當一輩子人面樹，
我就嫁不出去了。<stop_lip_animation n01515 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19418.en:
<start_lip_sync n01516 _normal m00001>The Rangers from Kamiharmui headquarters
and the Logging Alliance have all gone
home. I don't think they want to fight anymore.<stop_lip_animation n01516 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19418.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01516 _normal m00001>「本部のレンジャーや　伐採同盟の連中も
　それぞれの場所に　帰ってったぜ。
　さすがに　もう　争う気には　ならねーよな。<stop_lip_animation n01516 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19418.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01516 _normal m00001>: 본부의 레인저와 벌채 동맹도
　다들 돌아갔어. 그렇게 혼이 났으니
　이제 싸울 마음도 사라졌겠지.<stop_lip_animation n01516 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19418.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01516 _normal m00001>总部的游侠和采伐同盟的人们
也都回到各自的地方，
而且双方已经不再对抗了。<stop_lip_animation n01516 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19418.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01516 _normal m00001>總部的遊俠和採伐同盟的人們
也都各自回到各自的地方了，
現在應該已經不會再起爭執了吧。<stop_lip_animation n01516 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19419.en:
<start_lip_sync n01516 _normal m00001>I still have to figure out what we're going to do
with the folks from the Logging Alliance.
Looks like I won't be able to go out partying for awhile.<stop_lip_animation n01516 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19419.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01516 _normal m00001>「しかし　伐採同盟のヤツらの今後を
　どうするか　考えてやんなくちゃな。
　こりゃ　当分　合コンにゃ行けそうにねーや。<stop_lip_animation n01516 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19419.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01516 _normal m00001>: 하지만 벌채 동맹 녀석들을
　어떻게 처리할지 생각해야 하니…….
　당분간 미팅은 물 건너갔군.<stop_lip_animation n01516 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19419.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01516 _normal m00001>但是要想想，今后采伐同盟那些家伙
要怎么办才好啊。
看来暂时是没办法去参加联谊了。<stop_lip_animation n01516 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19419.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01516 _normal m00001>但是要想想，今後採伐同盟那些傢伙
該怎麼辦才好。
看來暫時是沒辦法去參加聯誼了。<stop_lip_animation n01516 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19420.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>Mmm hmm. Thanks for taking care of this.
We couldn't have done it without you.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19420.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「……うむ。うむ。
　任務　ご苦労だったな。
　ふたりとも　よく戻ってきてくれた。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19420.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: ……그래, 그래.
　임무, 수고 많았네.
　두 사람 다 정말 잘 돌아왔어.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19420.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>……嗯，嗯。
任务辛苦了。
欢迎你们两个回来。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19420.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>……嗯，嗯。
任務辛苦了。
歡迎你們兩個回來。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19421.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>We're going to be very busy for awhile, but
for now, let's have a feast to celebrate
everyone's safe return!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19421.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「これから　大いに　忙しくなるが
　今日のところは　皆の無事を祝って
　宴を開くとしよう！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19421.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 앞으로 많이 바빠지겠지만
　오늘은 모두 무사히 돌아온 걸 기념해
　파티를 열기로 하지!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19421.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>虽然接下来肯定会很忙，
但是，今天就先举办宴会，
庆祝大家平安无事吧！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19421.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>雖然接下來肯定會很忙，
但是，今天就先舉辦宴會，
慶祝大家平安無事吧！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19422.en:
That night, during the banquet,
<pc> told everyone the story
of the forest spirit, Spiel.
19422.ja:
その夜　もよおされた宴の中で
<pc>は　もうひとりの仲間が
どこへ行ったのかを　皆に語った。
19422.ko:
그날 밤 열린 파티에서
{pc}|hpp(은,는) 또 한 명의 동료가
어디로 갔는지를 모두에게 이야기했다.
19422.zh-Hans:
在当晚举办的宴会上，
<pc>向大家讲述了
另一个伙伴的去向。
19422.zh-Hant:
在當晚舉辦的宴會上，
<pc>向大家講述了
另一個夥伴的去向。

19423.en:
The feast to celebrate their companions safe return became a party in honor of Spiel. The rest of the night passed quietly.
And then morning came...
19423.ja:
たがいの無事を祝う祝宴は
いなくなった仲間を　しのぶ宴に変わり
静かに夜は　ふけていった。
19423.ko:
모두의 무사를 축하하는 파티는
사라진 동료를 기리는 자리로 변했고
그렇게 조용히 밤이 깊어 갔다.
19423.zh-Hans:
庆祝彼此平安的宴会
变成了消失的伙伴的缅怀会，
宁静的夜晚过去了。
19423.zh-Hant:
慶祝彼此平安的宴會
變成了緬懷不在夥伴的聚會，
寧靜的夜晚過去了。

19424.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>Good morning <pc>.
Renosu and Yugiri left early this morning
for their patrols in Morinara.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19424.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「おはよう　<pc>。
　レーノスと　ユウギリなら　すでに起きて
　モリナラの見回りに　出かけていったぞ。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19424.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 좋은 아침이군, <pc>.
　레노스와 유우기리는 일찌감치 일어나
　모리나라를 순찰하러 갔네.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19424.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>早上好，<pc>。
雷诺斯和夕雾已经起来
巡视万橡了。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19424.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>早安，<pc>。
雷諾斯和夕霧已經起來，
外出去巡視莫利納拉了。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19425.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>It's good to see that you're alright but we've
decided to terminate <pc>'s membership
with the Rangers Association.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19425.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「……ああ。お前さんは　いいんじゃ。
　じつは　今回の件で　<pc>の
　ここでの任を　解こうと決めたんじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19425.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: ……아, 자네는 됐네.
　사실 이번 일로 <pc> 자네를
　해임하기로 했거든.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19425.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>……啊。你就不用了。
其实我决定在这次事之后，
解除<pc>你在这里的职务。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19425.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>……啊，你就不用了。
其實，因為這次的事件，
我決定解除<pc>你在這裡的職務了。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19426.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>We all agreed that its best if you travel
the world and work to protect all forests
rather than limiting yourself here.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19426.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「お前さんには　任地などにとらわれず
　世界中の森を回り　自然を守ってほしい。
　レーノスも　ユウギリも　賛成してくれたよ。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19426.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 자네는 하나의 부임지에 머물기보다
　전 세계의 숲을 돌며 자연을 지켜 줬으면 하네.
　레노스와 유우기리도 찬성하더군.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19426.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>我希望你不受工作地点的束缚，
走遍全世界的森林，保护大自然。
雷诺斯和夕雾也赞同了我的决定。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19426.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>我希望你能不受工作地點的束縛，
走遍全世界的森林，保護大自然。
雷諾斯和夕霧也贊同了我的決定。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19427.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>This is an order from our superiors.
It's not up for discussion!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19427.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「これは　上司命令じゃからな。
　逆らうことは　許さんぞ！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19427.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 이건 상사의 명령이니
　불복은 용납하지 않겠네!<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19427.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>这是上司的命令。
决不允许你反抗！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19427.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>這是上司的命令。
你可不能反對喔！<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19428.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001><pc>, as of this moment you are hereby
relieved of your duties as a Molinara Ranger!
Thank you very much for your hard work.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19428.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「今　この時をもって　<pc>の
　モリナラ支部での任を解く！
　これまで　本当に　ご苦労じゃった。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19428.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 지금 이 시간을 기해 {pc}|hpp(을,를)
　모리나라 지부에서 해임한다!
　그동안 정말 고생 많았네.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19428.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>我宣布由此刻起，
解除<pc>在万橡支部的职务！
长久以来辛苦你了。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19428.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>我宣布從此刻起，
解除<pc>在莫利納拉分部的職務！
至今真是辛苦你了。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19429.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>Well then, chosen ranger, I expect great
things from you in the future! Stay strong
and keep doing your best wherever you go.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19429.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「それでは　選ばれし　レンジャーよ。
　お前さんの　今後の活躍を期待しておる！
　どこへ行っても　元気でやるのだぞ。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19429.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 그럼, 선택받은 레인저여.
　자네의 더 많은 활약을 기대하겠네!
　어디서든 건강히 지내게나.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19429.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>那么，被选中的游侠啊。
我很期待你今后的表现！
无论到了哪里都要打起精神哦。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19429.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>那麼，被選上的遊俠啊。
我很期待你今後的表現！
無論到了哪裡都要好好做喔。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

25073.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>...Damn it!
So this is how it's going to be, huh?
I messed up!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
25073.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「……チクショウ！ 
　これが　どうとでもできるってことか。
　失敗したぜっ！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
25073.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: ……젠장! 어떤 식으로든
　해코지할 수 있다는 게 이런 뜻이었나.
　실수했군!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
25073.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>……混账！ 
这就是所谓的为所欲为吗？
我们失败了！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
25073.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>……混帳！ 
這就是所謂的為所欲為嗎？
我們失敗了！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

25074.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>...Partner. This time, don't forget to
use the Brownie Boost!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

25074.ko:

25074.zh-Hans:

25074.zh-Hant:
